pkgmetadata.longdescription: Electronic Health Record (EHR) Data Processing and Analysis Tool // Process and analyze Electronic Health Record (EHR) data. Frequency and contingency tables for many binary outcomes and a binary exposure variable can be generated more efficiently. Phenome Wide Association Study (PheWAS) performed using EHR data can be analyzed using three commonly used statistical analysis methods: Firth's penalized-likelihood logistic regression; logistic regression with likelihood ratio test; conventional logistic regression with Wald test.
